Summary Heading: Brady Bunte - Casa de Flores -San Clemente
Summary: Nice location, clean rooms and nice bedding.  The staff was very friendly and I enjoyed my stay there. Very conveniently located and in a safe area and it is very quiet.  This is on my list of recommended Bed & Breakfast Hotels!   Tell them Brady Bunte sent you.

nice quiet stay and friendly staff, no complaints. nice clean sheets and no bed bugs. up to date and maintained well. close to the san clemente beach and pier. good location if you have family serving in the marines, next to the marine base.
